title: What's News: Business & Finance
text:
Supply-chain problems led Boeing to recently pause production of its 737 MAX aircraft for about 10 days, people familiar with the matter said.

The Stellantis unit formerly known as Chrysler is paying $300 million for conspiring to defraud federal regulators and customers about vehicle emissions, U.S. authorities said.

Bristol-Myers Squibb said it would acquire biotech company Turning Point Therapeutics for $4.1 billion.

What's News: Business & Finance
